name: Higurashi When They Cry Hou - Ch. 5 Meakashi
description: Higurashi When They Cry is a sound novel. The music, backgrounds and characters work together to create a world that is the stage of a novel for the user to read. They laugh and cry and get angry. The user takes the point of view of the protagonist to experience the story.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Pentium III 800 MHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 128MB DirectX 9c Compatible (Pixel Shader 2.0+) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: Pentium 4 1.4GHz Graphics: 256MB DirectX 9c Compatible (Pixel Shader 2.0+) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Any
